desc.cn: 用于查看 Logstash 的终端用户界面
desc.en: A terminal user interface for Logstash.

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew install edmocosta/homebrew-tap/tuistash && \
brew install tuistash

/cargo.cmd:
curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh && \
git clone https://github.com/edmocosta/tuistash.git && \
cd tuistash && \
cargo build --release
